```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
bank = read.csv("bank-additional.csv", sep=";")
```

```{r}
# Remove bad variables
drop<-c("duration", "emp.var.rate", "loan", "default", "education")
bank<-bank[,!names(bank)%in%drop]
```

```{r}
bank = na.omit(bank)
```

```{r}
# Model
logitmodel = glm(as.factor(y) ~ (.), data=bank, family = binomial("logit"))
```
